Posts.Content: Sharob wrote: Good Morning, Sister 1 had DCIS at 42 Her2neu3+, Sister 2 DCIS at 47 estrogen feeder, currently on Tamoxifen... both sisters had lumpectomies and radiation. My 2016 MRI concerns of swollen lymph nodes in both armpits, and T2 imaging 2 small cysts on right breast, followed by an ultrasound, which was diagnosed as benign. Recent MRI right side concern 2 oval 4-5 mm nodule (they asked if I had every had implants, answer no) - postmenopausal - 1 1/2 years no period. This all started June 7, 2017, I was surprised with full blown period. My gyn sched. an ultrasound and ruled out issues w/ovaries, followed by a routine MRI, which found the above. I had an 3D mamo - no findings, followed by an ultrasound found 2 - 6mm & 7mm round masses at 2 and 3 o'clock on right breast appears suspicious of malignancy. Then... I was surprised again June 30 with another full blow period. Tomorrow morning I will have an ultrasound guided needle biopsy on both sites. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Biopsy 2 areas right breast - 2 sisters who have had DCIS Sharob Sharob

Posts.Content: Jul 3, 2017 07:54PM Sharob wrote: I had my two biopsies today, I still have the effects of lidocaine, I am sure that I will be soar... but the procedure was not bad at all. I should have results within a few days. For anyone in the beginning stages, like me, please know that this part was way easier than I had anticipated. Many blessing to all for healthy results.
Posts.Title: Biopsy 2 areas right breast - 2 sisters who have had DCIS Sharob Sharob

Posts.Content: Jul 8, 2017 03:41AM Sharob wrote: I have great appreciation for this site. With this site and God's grace, I received amazing news today that my biopsies were both benign. I have two fibroid nodes that got so big that the blood supply was cut off, they died and shriveled up, showing two masses in my right breast. I have two sisters with DCIS... I was certain it was my turn... with all of my heart and prayers, I wish each and every person reading this post HOPE, LOVE, and PEACE in their hearts until and final result or ultimate cure is within their reach. Stay strong, we all make a difference, Amen <3
Posts.Title: Biopsy 2 areas right breast - 2 sisters who have had DCIS Sharob Sharob
